headline: Cafe Buddy Services
subtitle: Cyber Cafe Automation
title: Streamlined Document Services
description: Developed a full-stack application with a Node.js backend and responsive web interface for cyber cafe services like PAN card, voter ID, and resume design. Integrated a WhatsApp bot using WhatsApp-Web.js for document submission and order tracking via OpenRouter AI API. Features secure file uploads with Multer and SQLite, plus a PDF Logo Adder tool. Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, SQLite, WhatsApp-Web.js, Multer, Axios, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

headline: Telegram Quiz Bot with AI Chat
subtitle: Educational AI Bot
title: Interactive Quiz and Chat System
description: Created a Python-based Telegram bot for quizzes (Police Bharti, UPSC) with JSON-stored questions. Integrated Hugging Face InferenceClient for multilingual AI responses and added an auto-sleep feature. Designed commands (/start, /quiz, /quit) with robust error handling. Technologies: Python, python-telegram-bot, Hugging Face, JSON, asyncio.

headline: Worker Management System
subtitle: Web-Based Workforce Solution
title: Streamlined Worker and Attendance Management
description: Built a web-based Worker Management System using Google Apps Script, integrated with Google Sheets for data storage. Features include worker management, daily attendance tracking, attendance correction, and custom pay report generation. The system offers a modern, responsive UI with glassmorphism design. Future enhancements include advanced error handling and user authentication. Technologies: Google Apps Script, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Google Sheets.
